function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Disturbances and reduction in protection efforts leading to illegal trafficking of infrastructure, defoliation, wildlife exploitation, and trade in conflict areas","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential inter-species transmission of novel coronavirus in
